Name: (n/ psd.3)
Description: Manual merge if less than minimum

Name: (n/ psd.5a)
Description: Enclosure of diff by nsdm(psdm), except for butting edge

Name: (n/ psd.5b)
Description: Enclosure of tap by nsdm(psdm), except for butting edge

Name: (n/ psd.6)
Description: Enclosure of diff/tap butting edge by nsdm (psdm)

Name: (n/ psd.7)
Description: Spacing of NSDM/PSDM to opposite implant diff or tap (for non-abutting diff/tap edges)

Name: (n/ psd.8)
Description: Nsdm and psdm cannot overlap diff/tap regions of opposite doping

Name: (n/ psd.9)
Description:
Diff and tap must be enclosed by their corresponding implant layers. Rule exempted for
  - diff inside "advSeal_6um* OR cuPillarAdvSeal_6um*" pcell for SKY130P*/SP8P*/SKY130DI-5R-CSMC flows
  - diff rings around the die at min total L>1000 um and W=0.3 um
  - gated_npn 
  - :drc_tag:`areaid.zer`.
